I am curious about kogai attributions.  When I see mumei pre-Edo kogai 
it =
seems that they fall into Ko Mino, Ko Kinko, sometimes Ko Goto but 
many to=
 Goto Sojou.  (I believe many came from the fittings Museum 
Collection).  =
What are the differentiating qualities to catagorize the 
schools and why i=
s it that so many seem to be attributed to Sojou?
